description:
Man, did we have a great time at our borrowed desert resort house! It was our third day there and it was the middle of summer. It was so fucking hot even the insects were complaining. The upside was that our boys were running around naked almost constantly. Also, there's something about the heat that makes young men very, very horny!
One of the running jokes during our stay was that everyone was kind of afraid of Rylan's huge donkey dick. OK, so maybe "afraid" isn't the right word. It was more like concern that they wouldn't be able to take it.
On our first day, Curtis took it like a pro and actually seemed to love it. So after that it seemed less ominous, but I could still catch the guys keeping an eye on the massive meat swinging between Rylan's legs as he walked naked around the house and pool!
Ken knew his time was coming and he was excited. He and Rylan had been getting along really well and I could tell they were excited to fuck.
However, Ken was a little worried that Rylan was going to tear him up.
Long story short — Ken was walking funny afterward!
title: Rylan & Ken
